name: Legend Spirit Eau de Toilette
ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 39-C), Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Coumarin, Citronellol, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Citral, Eugenol, BHT.

reviews.review_text: Loved the cent and the price, I recommend this cologne to anyone who loves to smell good.

reviews.review_title: Not super unique, but still sexy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc did it again! While I donu2019t find this fragrance to be super unique  in itself, it still gives off a sophisticated polished finish. Donu2019t let the light packaging fool you either, this fragrance has some sexy deep masculine vibes going on with it. Smells masculine with a hint of clean sophistication.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit has completely transformed my fragrance game. Its blend of energizing citrus, intense cardamom, and sensual woody base creates an invigorating experience every time I wear it. It exudes confidence and sophistication, making me feel unstoppable every day. Whether it's a casual outing or a formal event, this scent perfectly complements any occasion. I can't recommend it enough u2013 it's truly become my signature scent, and I encourage everyone to experience its captivating allure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wearing Mont Blanc Legend draws an abundance of compliments, truly remarkable. It's my go-to scent, cherished for its subtle strength and enduring allure. A little spritz lasts all day, making it a must-have. I wholeheartedly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit my favorite Montblanc cologne. The combination of base, middle, and top notes is honestly a masterpiece. The white musk and lavender shine through on my skin and lasts all day long. It is fresh, but still sexy. Absolutely would recommend!!!

reviews.review_title: Happy to have in my collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit 3.3 oz / 100ml cologne is the epitome of sophistication in a bottle. With its invigorating blend of citrus, lavender, and woods, each spritz is an instant confidence boost. This fragrance exudes a timeless charm that effortlessly transitions from day to night, leaving a trail of elegance wherever you go. Whether you're a seasoned connoisseur or new to the world of fragrances, Montblanc Legend Spirit is a must-have addition to your collection. Elevate your scent game and make a lasting impression with Montblanc Legend Spirit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Montblanc Legend Spirit for a while now, and I've got to say, it's a pretty solid choice for everyday wear. It's got this fresh, woody scent that's not too overpowering but still noticeable. The mix of citrus, cardamom, and lavender is a nice touch, giving it a bit of a unique twist compared to other fragrances I've tried. It's casual enough for a day out but also has a bit of elegance to it, which is great for evenings or more formal occasions. Overall, it's a reliable fragrance that doesn't try too hard to stand out, but still does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is one of the best daily fragrance i have ever used period this fragrance has amazing freshness and sweetness!! buy it right now you wont regret it if youre looking for a summer cologne that is affordable you can also get 6 hours of longevity! worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cologne is perfect for daily use. Perfect to wear in the office and very very clean. Iu2019m so so excited to keep wearing this all summer. The compliments Iu2019ve gotten is crazy. Will definitely repurchase

reviews.review_title: My go-to fresh out the shower scent!
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite fresher scents with just enough hint of citrus, floral and woodsy to keep that fresh out of the shower feel going all day long! Iu2019ve gotten compliments everywhere Iu2019ve worn this scent even when I donu2019t smell it on myself anymore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My partner loved the last scent I got him from Montblanc so i thought he would want to give this one a try! He loves it! Itu2019s very 2000s mall sporty emo boy smelling, in the BEST way possible. Not too overbearing but very long lasting and memorable. Very excited for him to keep using this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First I love the packaging on this. The bottle just looks good on my husbands side of the bathroom. The smell is a little more lighter or brighter than I thought. It isnu2019t floral but has just more of a u201csofteru201d scent which I assume is the lavender coming through. I like how this lingers lightly all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and feels so luxurious. I love the masculine yet sweet smell of the fragrance. It will be my go to cologne moving forward specially when going out or any important event I have to go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m loving this one so much. The bottle packaging is simple and elegant wit a scent that is just so good. The notes of citrus, cardamom, lavender and wood makes this one smelling fresh and clean throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I wear a montblanc cologne I always get tons of compliments, this one is not an exception. I love how masculine the woody base it is while at the same time giving a bit of feminine touch with the lavender and citrus. It smells clean and rich! Will continue to buy!

smells amazing! Super clean, fresh, and citrusy. Makes me feel important and confident. Smells like Macys in the BEST way possible! Lovely bottle design too! I don't have to hide it like other fragrence bottles. 1010/ would reccomend !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the sense of the cologne. It makes me feel confident, fresh, and ready to take on the world. I love the bottle so itu2019s easily recognizable in my cupboard. This is now one of my favorite go to colognes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance smells super clean fresh and citrusy!  Makes me feel important and confident as heck! Smell like macys in the best way possible!  Sleek botttle design. Donu2019t have to hide it cuz itu2019s NOT ugly like some other fragrecses!  10/10 would get again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this fresh aquatic scent, and have worn it everywhere, from the office to the gym. That is how versatile this fragrance is. It just gives you that clean scent like youu2019ve just had a shower with very expensive and luxurious shower products. It is also one of those crowd-pleasers that will have people coming up to you to tell you that you smell good. I wear this both in the day and at night, and it has worked well regardless. The sillage is not super strong so the projection area is pretty much kept to a radius of say 3 feet away from you. The longevity is around 6 hours in my own experience with the first two to three hours having that projection area of 3 feet and the last three being very much of a skin scent. I also really like the bottle design. It just looks so exquisite and premium, and makes my bathroom counter look handsome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Mont Blanc Legend Spirit is a fragrance I personally enjoy for its fresh and uplifting qualities. The opening burst of pink pepper, grapefruit, and bergamot is invigorating, making it a great choice for starting the day. The heart notes of lavender, cardamom, and aquatic accords add a touch of sophistication that I appreciate. As the fragrance settles, the warm and comforting base of sandalwood, cedarwood, and cashmere lingers pleasantly on the skin. Overall, Mont Blanc Legend Spirit is a versatile and modern scent that I find myself reaching for regularly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good. A nice bold and vibrant smell. I will most definitely recommend this scent and brand. I have the legend eau de fragrance and it smells great. It doesnu2019t have the same boldness but Mixing the two together will create a wonderful smell for any occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently got this cologne and it truly smells amazing, very fresh, citrusy, with a hint of spice that adds sophistication. This scent is very daytime but however very elegant, youu2019ll command the room without overwhelming peoples noses. I can see this scent at a nice lunch or business meeting. If you are not into strong scents but definitely want to make an impression then this is the scent for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is to die for!! It smells so amazing, expensive & boujeeu2026 the amount of compliments I recover when I wear this is crazy.. Definitely has been one of my go tou2019s lately!!! Itu2019s tooo good! 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hello, thank you i received my perfume 1 week ago first thing first i really love the packaging and it's smells absolutely amazing and i had no issues to receive my package I'm definitely gonna buy it again It's like I've never smell this before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a huge fan of the brand! especially the Legend is one of my favorite scents of all time! Itu2019s so nice and clean yet great for going out, special occasions. Such a great scent and great price too!!!

So unfortunately Iu2019m still sick and canu2019t smell but this is my brotheru2019s girlfriendu2019s view of the cologne u201cOooh yes yes I love that, it smells clean masculine and tropical like you should be going to a fancy island vacation, yes I love this scentu201d So Iu2019d say itu2019s a win scent wise

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on Mont Blanc's Legend Spirit, and it's been a game-changer for my fragrance collection. The scent strikes the perfect balance between classic and modern, with a fresh, woody twist that's perfect for any occasion. It's not overpowering but has a presence that lingers pleasantly throughout the day. Whether I'm headed to the office or out for a casual evening, Legend Spirit adds that extra touch of sophistication. Definitely a must-try for those looking to make a subtle yet impactful statement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit is a powerfully modern scent designed for a passionate man who yearns to explore new horizons. The fragrance reveals a more casual side of the Montblanc Legend man while maintaining the same versatility, elegance and charisma i loved it so much it has such a good scent ud83eudeb5ud83cudf36ufe0fud83dudd25 i highly recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gentlemen, if you aim to captivate the attention of women, this is an absolute essential! Its fresh and woody aroma is perfect for daily wear, particularly during spring and summer. I would highly recommend it to anyone who appreciates a crisp, masculine fragrance. A perfect 10 out of 10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never used anything from this brand before, but have always been interested and now that Iu2019ve given this scent a try I canu2019t go back. Itu2019s an amazing scent that is so elegant and manly. I want to wear it everyday doing everything, but I also love it so much that I want to savior every last drop and not waste it. Iu2019ve tried it out through sweaty days at work and it does last, but it is on the softer side so if you sweat and stink a lot I would suggest using a bit more. But, 2 pumps works perfect for me on the daily. Itu2019s gonna last and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend  Spirit, 100 ml Eau de Toilette has very elegant sleek bottle. The scent is fresh and slightly spicy .  You can notice notes of bergamot, grapefruit, lavender, sandalwood, and white musk.  Itu2019s kinda mix of woody and fresh scent .  This is an elegant, and invigorating fragrance, that lasts for a couple of hours.  Itu2019s perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very pleasantly surprised by how much I loved Montblanc Legend Spirit EDT. I immediately got a masculine floral top note, which settled into a woody base. This would be a sexy scent for any man!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im so glad i was able to receive something for this post. This fragrance honestly smells really good its very clean/expressive at the same time. It has a musky, vanilla, woody, spicy smell. which I honestly love and its a very light smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this legend spirit and the legend one in the black bottle for the bf. I definitely like this one more for a summery warm weather smell because of how lifting the citrus notes make it. It is balanced with lasting woodsy base so itu2019s not too fruity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance smells so good! It has a masculine scent that isnu2019t too strong and doesnu2019t give a headache. It has a woody and citrusy kind of scent with notes of cardamom and lavender. I gifted this to my father and he loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is absolutely captivating! It opens with a burst of freshness infused with a touch of intrigue from the spicy notes. The initial sparkle mellows into a pleasant and inviting aroma that lingers beautifully throughout the day.  I can imagine this becoming a signature scent for warmer weather, especially during spring and summer. It has a lightness and vibrancy that perfectly complements those seasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: An exquisite perfume that I would ultimately give to my relatives because it is so good. Its aroma is magnificent and it is the third time I have refilled it. Its notes are very fresh, ideal for any type of occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Summer in a bottle!!! This scent is so fresh , itu2019s a must have for summer time is citrusy what makes it perfect for warms days , in despite it is a eau toilette the longevity is pretty good , 8 hours on my skin and 10 on my clothes , itu2019s a versatile fragrance you can wear it in day time and also in night time , smell clean and fresh , I love it ud83dude0d  Complimentary by Montblanc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit Eau de Toilette is a refreshing and invigorating fragrance that is ideal for daily use. The scent is clean and crisp, featuring notes of pink pepper, grapefruit, and bergamot. Its long-lasting formula ensures it stays on the skin for hours without being overwhelming. The sleek and modern bottle design makes it a stylish addition to any fragrance collection. In summary, Montblanc Legend Spirit Eau de Toilette is a timeless scent that is likely to become a go-to choice for many.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for this post. I surprised my boyfriend with a bottle of Montblanc Legend Spirit cologne, and he absolutely loved it. The fragrance has a refreshing citrusy scent with a hint of musk, giving it a unique and sophisticated edge. It is perfect for everyday wear or special occasions, and it lasts all day without being overpowering. My boyfriend received compliments whenever he wore it, and I would highly recommend it as a gift for any man in your life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I go into Sephora many times and love to browse the fragrances. This one is one of the fragrances I kept smelling and wanted to get! This pairs really well with other scents but is also good on its own! Nice masculine scent! Good for date nights or the everyday!

reviews.review_title: A versatile cologne for any outfits!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a clean fresh scent for men. It smells very fresh and clean just like fresh out of the shower. I got so many compliments from strangers whenever i wear this. It is a good match with many outfits especially button down shirt and smart casual style!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of fragrances from this awesome brand and they do not disappoint. This scent is woodsy with citrus undertones. Definitely more of a daytime casual scent. Very sensual and inviting. The perfect spring fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: very pleasant casual scent- definitely more on the going out side of fragrances. would be really nice for an outdoor dinner or even pool party. the lavender is strong and nice but not in a off-putting way. would layer well with a more citrusy scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The name Legend Spirit perfectly encapsulates the essence of this fragrance. It exudes a sense of adventure and vitality, making it the perfect choice for the modern man who isn't afraid to embrace his inner legend.The fragrance opens with invigorating notes that awaken the senses, including a burst of zesty citrus and aromatic herbs. As it settles, hints of lavender and crisp woods emerge, adding depth and complexity to the composition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking for a fragrance that is clean but lasts a long time and finally found it with Monteblanc legend spirit. This is definitely an everyday scent and have gotten compliments and that is the best feeling ever.

reviews.review_title: My Favorite Montblanc Fragrance So Far! ud83eudd0d
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My husband and I have really been enjoying Montblanc colognes, our first being Explorer and now adding Legend Spirit to the collection. I received this Legend Spirit from Montblanc. I must say the scent is my favorite so far! It is a masculine citrusy, aquatic, musky, yet woody fragrance. ud83eudd0d  Legend Spirit is just the right amount of everything to make a truly beautiful menu2019s fragrance. Top scent notes consist of Grapefruit, Bergamot and Pink Pepper. Middle notes are Water Notes, Lavender and Cardamom and base notes are White Musk, White Woods, Cashmere Wood and Oakmoss. This is such a beautiful fresh citrusy, clean, masculine scent. All the scent notes play beautifully with one another! This cologne smells amazing on my husband and is a fragrance I just canu2019t get enough of on him! ud83eudd0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My son absolutely loves this scent, he has the regular one and now this one he uses leg and for the day use and the black one for night or weekend use. It has a woodsy mossy scent that has a hint of sweet not overly sweet just a hint. Definitely a perfect gift to add to anyoneu2019s collection

CANT STOP SMELLING MY MAN, this scent is the perfect combination of fresh and light while still giving the masculine feel that Montblanc is known for! I am sensitive to strong overpowering colognes so this is a win for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a unique menu2019s fragrance. It has strong citrus notes mixed with the spicy and sweetness of the cardamom! Despite being an EDT, it smells strong and lasts long. Itu2019s going to be the perfect scent for spring and summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing fragrance, its perfect combination of citrus and woody notes, is so refreshing, perfect for everyday. One or two sprays are enough for the whole day. I have to say that Iu2019m so impressed with this cologne, I just love it!

I absolutely love mont blonc. This fragrance is so light but strong at the same time. Lots of florals. I love once it melts into my skin and can wear it all day long! Definitely a daytime scent n Iu2019m sure perfect in the spring

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Today I have received montblanc legend spirit and this is perfectly matched my vibes, all the notes of the fragrance is created with love, when Iu2019m using this fragrance, I u2018m always getting lots of compliments from people, my highest recommendation! u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Quite a classy woody fragrance. I like this fragrance for its amazing freshness, sweetness and a bit of crisp. without being too overwhelming or overpowering. It lasts very long on my skin and clothes. In my opinion, it can be worn all year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent! Itu2019s very subtle and refreshing. I love that it has a hint of sweetness in the fragrance notes. The cologne lasts on the skin as well. I got many compliments on the way it smelled on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has to be one of my most favorite perfumes ever. It smells so fresh and amazing. The scent last the whole day with just one spray. So many people stopped and ask me what am I wearing. I got this as gift but would 1000% repurchase again
Perfect combination of fresh citrus while still giving off the elegant and masculine experience Montblanc is known for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this scent is really great, i had never before tried this brand and i really like what they offer now, it gives off the vibes of any classic designer scent and stays on but isnu2019t overwhelming at all..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit is a modern and versatile scent that combines citrus, spicy and woody notes. It opens with a refreshing burst of pink pepper, grapefruit and bergamot, followed by a smooth and aromatic heart of lavender, cardamom and aquatic notes. The drydown is warm and cozy, with sandalwood, cedar, cashmere and musk.  The fragrance is suitable for any occasion, whether it is casual, formal or romantic. My husband really enjoyed it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc legend, spirits  is a luxurious bottle Perfume for men this was the perfect gift for my husband smells soft, manly and long lasting  for hours and doesnu2019t stain his shirts into his collection it goes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite colognes! The packaging is really nice and feels great in the hand. The scent lasts all day even after I went to the gym my husband was still able to smell it! 10/10 recommend you get this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Montblanc Legend Spirit smells amazing! I love how it smells fresh but also masculine! I think this fragrance stands out from other fragrances iu2019ve smelled. This definitely smells on the more luxury end as well, which I love!

Just received this today & I love it! I have to say I think the black bottle version of this is my fave but this one smells more summery almost? Like a watery vibe but still smells SO good! They both kinda have that Abercrombie smell to them but I love it personally. Def would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so lovley. My fiancu00e9 smells so great I canu2019t get enough of him! The scent is amazing and manly without being overpowering. I love that it smells so sophisticated and professional without being a generic cologne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc legend Spirit is a great cologne! Starting with the packaging to the scent, my husband has been delighted with this cologne. He specially enjoyed the woody scent in the fragrance. He wore it for several hours and said fragrance was still intact as if it was just applied!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Anytime I wear this, I always feel like Iu2019m wearing something amazing. Itu2019s like date night, vacation vibes. Woodsy and spicy. I love it. When it comes to longevity, I noticed it will last for several hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Montblancu2019s Legend Spirit is one of those timeless + distinguished fragrances that (at least I believe) can be worn year-round. I have the other Montblanc Legend in the black bottle, and find this one to have an entirely different olfactory profile u2014 this one is complex, yet refined at the same time.   I honestly cannot individually recognize the fragrance notes listed in the in the description,  however to me it smells fresh/woody/floral, slightly powdery, and sophisticated. Itu2019s a conversation starter for sure.  The bottle itself is also very beautiful + well-made/high-quality. All in all itu2019s another Montblanc win for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit is a mass appealing citrus aquatic woody fragrance. You get a punch of citrus in the opening followed by aquatic notes mixed with lavender which gives the fragrances a sophisticated feel. The dry down is a masculine woody scent that will have people come closer to you to get a whiff of your scent!

This is such a good colon it literally lasts all day and I get so many compliments on this and my boyfriend does too when wears it. Not to mention the packaging is so aesthetically pleasing! Obsessed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my husbandu2019s favorite cologne it smells amazing!!! Heu2019s worn it for years and he gets compliments all the time!! Itu2019s not cheap, but it does last. Has a really good scent that lasts all day. I absolutely love it and so does he. Its not too overpowering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very masculine scent that has amazing lasting power. It mixed really nice when my husbands body chemistry. It has a deep woody smell and a hint of lavender which is really nice! It has has a freshness about it with the added citrus. I definitely recommend you try it or get it for your significant other so you can smell it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My partner loves using the Montblanc Legend Spirit for date night. It is a charismatic scent and makes him feel cool and confident. I like smelling the fresh woody scent. The bottle itself is classy too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's a very masculine scent that starts off really strong in the woodsy territory but faded gently into a more soft, almost grass like smell mixed with the lavender in here. It smells very herbal without being a floral fronted fragrance. Definitely made me feel good and confident, and on the masculine side without being musky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The special fragrance of wood is subtle enough but long lasting. The unique blend of citrus and wood is one of my absolute favorites and I simply adore design of the bottle. Montblac Legend Spirit is truly legendary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this legend spirit is from Montblanc. the packaging bottle has a elegant and sleek design, great for gifting. the smell is ok, a little reminiscent of middler school locker room. it is long lasting so one spritz is good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, Montblanc Legend Spirit is a versatile and timeless fragrance that exudes confidence and charm. Whether you're heading to the office or out for a night on the town, this fragrance is sure to turn heads and leave a lasting impression. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a modern, masculine scent with a touch of sophistication.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cologne smells great. Itu2019s a more subtle version of the original Montblanc cologne. gifted by MontBlanc it has hints of lavender, which I really like to settle it down. I would recommend it pretty affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance by Montblanc is amazing. I absolutely love the way it smells on me. I get a ton of compliments. If you really wanna impress that your man or the special someone this is the fragrance for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this is amazing I keep getting comments on how nice it smells also it lasts all day and it doesnu2019t stain your clothes which is amazing. I love the scent and the packaging is amazing too..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Is you like woody, musky scents this would a perfect for you.  It also smells very fresh and has smell of cardamom as well. One of the best one that i have tried so far. The love how it stays for so long .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume by MontBlanc smells great. Itu2019s on the neutral side and not too much spice or tobacco scent in it. Itu2019s not strong but very long lasting. I would say it can be used any occasion whether work or night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed either way this fragrance! It has a crisp citrus opening and seductive woody base that create an amazing composition - very modern and masculine. I would say itu2019s a safe scent that most people would love. Itu2019s not overly musky or fresh - just the right amount of everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc legend spirit is almost like legend but not exactly, my husband thinks its milder form of legend, but its a great daily wear scent ! Lasts for a long time and smells elegant just like all montblanc! Definitely recommend

reviews.review_title: A great add to your collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This MontBlanc Legend Spirit cologne is amazing. It has notes of grapefruit, bergamot, and lavender.  It is a super subtle cologne that will definitely get you compliments. You can wear it for a date night or just to the store.  A timeless pierce to add to add to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My man absolutely loves this cologne! It smells super fresh with a very slight hint of woody/fruity. Itu2019s seriously amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit is an invigorating cologne that opens with a fresh burst of citrus, followed by a subtle blend of lavender and peppermint. Its clean and modern scent is versatile for both casual and formal occasions. The longevity is decent, though the projection tends to be moderate. The stylish, minimalist bottle reflects the sophistication of the fragrance. While it may not be groundbreaking, Legend Spirit is a reliable choice for those who appreciate a crisp, clean aroma that exudes a timeless elegance.

reviews.review_title: Not a statement maker, but nice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Legend Spirit is an easy to wear scent that leads with a fresh citrus opening with woody base notes. It's not a particularly complex scent but it's still a good scent fit for any occasion or season & the sleek white bottle fits the fragrance well & looks nice on the vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is one of the most refreshing fragrances and is long-lasting. This is by far my favorite scent. This unconventional woody aromatic leather fragrance features the freshness of Italian Bergamot, the power of Haitian Vetiver, and the richness of Indonesian Patchouli. This is a perfect scent for all occasions. Once I spritz it on the body I feel mesmerized by its smell. Whenever I wear this, it makes me feel good and fresh and pulls everyoneu2019s attention. It has long-lasting staying power. Overall I loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a refreshing scent, perfect for daytime wear for me. It is a perfume with a scent of tranquility and elegance. the woody touch leaves the scent sensual. The smell is wonderful. The packaging is very elegant too.

This is a great everyday fragrance, and perfect for those just getting into wearing fragrances. It's a very nice, fresh, and masculine scent. Nothing super unique, which some may see as a downside but in my opinion that keeps it inoffensive and awesome for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect daytime fragrance for any occasion, great mix of citrus and woody notes combined energizing you for the day. I love perfumes or EDPs because they put more note oils in them making them last longer and mix better with your skin thatu2019s why they are always a bit more expensive than eau de toilettes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice fresh scent, I got this for my husband, and now he smells nice! Itu2019s not a strong fragrance so it doesnu2019t last as long because itu2019s more of a fresh and light scent. So you do need to re spray through out the day. But other than that it smells very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Montblanc Legend Spirit! The bottle is so pretty. I am a big fan of masculine scents and this smells super nice. It looks great on my counter too. I love how it wears through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is very light and fresh. It is masculine and energetic and not overpowering. I think they would be a great day scent for men. This one is playful and makes me feel young and alive. I would recommend to others looking for a refreshing yet masculine day fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells amazing in person and really surprised me for how nice it is for everyday use. It does have a unisex kind of scent to it and I can see anyone wearing it. There's some citrus notes as well as lavender and it just feels very fresh, light for the day. Not too heavy of a scent and it does feel like good quality that is powerful with even just one spritz. Overall, I'd say it's great for men that want a casual and refreshing scent that is uplifting for the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit is a fragrance that epitomizes sophistication and versatility. With fresh notes of bergamot and pink pepper transitioning into lavender, cardamom, and woods, it evolves into a refined essence. From day to night, it stays fresh with touches of sandalwood and white musk. The bottle reflects Montblanc's timeless elegance. Legend Spirit is a go-to choice for those seeking a fragrance that exudes confidence and refinement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Montblanc Legend Spirit EDP and I was mighty impressed. It is a refreshing woody fragrance with notes of Citrus, Cardamom, Lavender and Sensual Woods. It is strong, lang lasting fragrance with an amazing throw. My husband received so many compliments when he wore this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit Eau de Toilette makes for a fantastic spring/summer signature. Fans of invigorating modern fragrances with woody undertones should definitely sample this one. The blend of citrus, aromatic spices and light woods is contemporary and instantly likeable. A very solid release from the house of Montblanc!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cologne on my husband. The bottle design is sleek and minimalistic. This scent strikes a fine balance between being fresh and sophisticated, making it suitable for various occasions. It's perfect for daytime wear during warmer seasons. It can also be used as a unisex scent. The longevity is also great because it is last for several hours. It is perfect for gifting too .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I wore this I got so many comments and compliments, it lasted on my skin pretty well, and I enjoy how masculine this fragrance smells, itu2019s definitely for a classic man. I received this in exchange for a honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my husband and he liked the scent. It is a nice blend of citrus and woody-lavender. The bottle looks gorgeous and the scent lasts for a long time. I think it is priced well too. A good present for yourself or a loved one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely superb. Itu2019s fresh perfect for the day. My husbandu2019s new favorite cologne. Heu2019s been wearing it everyday and gets compliments every time he wears it. Itu2019s a lighter version of the black montblanc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells fresh, my husband loves it! Will definitely be purchasing the other one from montblanc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received something in exchange for this post. this cologne smells very sophisticated but in a good way. it smells really fresh. it was a christmas present for a loved one and i thought he wasnu2019t gonna like it but he loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This montblanc cologne in the white bottle is lighter than the black one and I love it a lot itu2019s very clean and fresh and perfect for the day time. Montblanc makes amazing colognes and I am obsessed !

reviews.review_title: Such a nice and masculine fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such nice fragrance! Itu2019s very masculine, I love when my husband wears it, itu2019s fresh, airy and has some citrus notes as well, it lasts all day and I can even smell it on his clothes the next day; definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Good, just not a signature scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Woody and fresh. I feel like its freshness makes it appropriate for my man to wear any season or time of day.  Lavender , oak moss, pink peppercorn, and white musks are most detectable. I do get a very slight citrus in the opening (likely from the grapefruit note). Its Longevity and projection both are on the weaker side of moderate (4 hours on skin maybe 6 on clothes) . The bottle packaging is nice and sturdy and  I feel like the white and silver coloring  matches the fresh profile of the fragrance and the bottle over all does have a masculine vibe. I think this scent isnu2019t necessarily complex , making it seem a little less unique and less luxury. However, it is not a bad scent. My boyfriend does like to wear it, it just isnu2019t his most reached for in his collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love when my husband wears this cologne. It smells incredible. He loves it too, and thatu2019s saying a lot since he doesnu2019t like a lot of scents. The bottle is very heavy and well made. It looks great sitting on top of the counter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this masculine scent! It's airy enough for everyday and isn't nauseating.  It's a more refreshing scent that I could throw on in the morning. It does smell kind of young though so if you feel weird about that, this won't be for you.

reviews.review_title: Love it! itu2019s very fresh & I love the citrus
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has been the perfect everyday fragrance for me. It has a fresh citrus scent that really wakes me up in the morning, and isnu2019t overpowering. I also get so many compliments everytime I wear it, and itu2019s very long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most unique scents that I have. Itu2019s masculine but has a citrus note thatu2019s sweet but very subtle. This fragrance also lasts all day on my skin, and even longer on clothes. It smells fresh & clean, and itu2019s quickly become my new everyday fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very sporty and young eau de toilet spray. it's a bot intense to my like but you just have to a wait a bit and it will lay exactly as you want. best for golf game, horse ride, tennis and also riding my roadster on Florida coast. great scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Legend Spirit by Mont Blanc is aquatic, freshness with some sweetness. The musky base makes this a great option to wear in the cooler months but this really shines in the warm weather. I recommend this for the younger guys seeking attention.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a classic fragrance that has a nice aromatic woodiness to it. Cardamom is one of my favorite notes, son Iu2019m always drawn to fragrances with it. Very lovely. Even though I received this in exchange for a post about it, these are my honest opinions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cologne for my husband and we both really like it. It's not as intense/woody as Mont Blanc Legend. He described it as more of a fresh, crisp scent. I smell a lot of lavender at first, but it leans more citrusy on the dry down. It is a long lasting fragrance and my husband approves!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit perfume is a jubilation of timeless elegance and modern charisma. This revitalizing fragrance orchestrates a harmonious blend of freshness and sophistication, capturing the essence of a true gentleman. The top notes, featuring pink peppercorn and bergamot, create a lively and invigorating opening. The heart notes, with lavender and cardamom, add a refined touch to the composition. As the fragrance settles, the base notes of white woods and oak moss contribute to a subtle yet enduring masculinity. Montblanc Legend Spirit is a scent that radiates confidence and charm, making it an ideal choice for those who appreciate a fusion of classic and contemporary elements in their fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit is my go-to fragrance! Its modern, fresh, and woody notes perfectly capture my adventurous spirit. The citrusy burst with cardamom and lavender undertones creates an irresistibly cool and confident vibe. It's the essence of versatility, elegance, and charisma in a bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been enjoying this fragrance. It's a subtle scent that lingers throughout the day. I appreciate its woody and sensual undertones, complemented by subtle hints of citrus and lavender. It truly embodies sophistication, and I received compliments the first time I wore it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Legend Spirit perfume is a celebration of timeless elegance and modern charisma. This invigorating fragrance is a symphony of freshness and sophistication, perfectly embodying the spirit of a true gentleman. With top notes of pink peppercorn and bergamot, it opens with a zesty and vibrant energy. The heart notes of lavender and cardamom provide a refined touch, while the base notes of white woods and oak moss impart a subtle and enduring masculinity. Montblanc Legend Spirit is a fragrance that exudes confidence and charm, making it a perfect companion for those who appreciate a blend of classic and contemporary elements in their scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this scent. It is a lightweight scent that lasts all day. I love how it is woodsy and sensual, but has hints of citrus and lavender. It is a really great sophisticated scent. I even got compliments the first time I wore it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been wearing this for years and this is my FIRST full size of the cologne. I love how warm and sexy it smells without being overpowering. I love a gender neutral fragrance and this is one of the few traditionally masculine ones I wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Legend Spirit is a nice everyday fragrance for the office or weekend days.  It's a versatile fragrance with notes of Citrus, Cardamom, Lavender and Sensual Woods. The combination of these notes together creates a refreshing, clean scent!
